snippet: The Center for Reproductive Rights says governments around the world still deprive women of control over their reproductive capacity.
abstract: Letter from Nancy Northup, president of the Center for Reproductive Rights, responds to June 27 article on forced abortions in China.
lead_paragraph: The Center for Reproductive Rights says governments around the world still deprive women of control over their reproductive capacity.
